mapper.select: select u.u_id, nick, exp, cheer, stamp, u.lv_code, c_parent_code as icon_class, c_content4 as icon_color, c_nm as lv, c_content1 as stored_exp, c_content2 as required_exp from user u inner join common_code c on (c.c_code = u.lv_code) where email = #{email}
mapper.insert: insert into user (sns_type, sns_id, email, nick, lv_code) values (#{sns_type}, #{sns_id}, #{email}, #{nick}, #{lv_code})
insert into acc_log (login_status, login_type, u_id) values (#{login_status}, #{login_type}, #{u_id})
mapper.select: select role_code from role where u_id = #{u_id}
insert into inven (u_id, c_code, p_id) values (#{u_id}, #{c_code}, #{p_id})
